title: Child survival alliance
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Poliomyelitis vaccine

description: Looks at Colombia's massive attempt to immunize all its children. Three days a year are set aside by the government to give the children vaccines against polio, diptheria, whooping cough, tetanus and measles.
